headline: Lam Research Links CEA Leti Partnership And New Leaders To AI Demand
summary: Lam Research (NasdaqGS:LRCX) has entered a multi year collaboration with CEA Leti focused on next generation specialty technology devices and advanced fabrication processes. The partnership targets new materials and process flows for applications in AI, high performance computing and other specialty semiconductor uses. The company has made executive changes, including appointing Dr. Anirudh Devgan, president and CEO of Cadence Design Systems, to its board of directors. Lam Research has also...
